article: I think the best place to go on Sunday is the zoo. When you are  _  , you can go there with your family.  _  the zoo, there are many animals: elephants, deer,  monkeys  , rabbits and other animals. Elephants are the  _  animals on land. I  hear  there is a baby elephant in our zoo. So I want to  see  at it. Yu Xuan wants to go with me. She says, "  _  we go there together?" "Sure!" I say. "We can  _  a good time there. But let's  go  there at half past four. I have  _  homework to do."
